MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH1 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Candlemaker Row and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 2:33pm. Our engineers have arrived Candlemaker Row substation and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 5:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:15pm on the 14th October 2020.
